def_cn: （用来装饰衣服、窗帘等的）布带，穗带
def_en: Braid is a narrow piece of decorated cloth or twisted threads, which is used to decorate clothes or curtains.

def_cn: 把（头发）编成辫子；把（丝线）编成辫状
def_en: If you braid hair or a group of threads, you twist three or more lengths of the hair or threads over and under each other to make one thick length.
A braid is a length of hair which has been divided into three or more lengths and then braided.
